Name: Viaerium
About the game: Those who are lost must seek Wisdom. Those who seek Wisdom must seek the Council. Viaerium is a short, soothing story about You, embarking on a journey through a radiant path to reach the enigmatic Council to make your Idea come true. Walk among the relaxing vistas and breath in the serenity along your way. Vision: Wander through the thought-provoking odyssey to look at your life goals through a different perspective. Tranquility: With outstanding songs by Philipp Weigl and Kai Engel to accompany you through the radiant landscapes of Viaerium. 3D Platforming : Calm journey unfolds with a relaxing third-person movement. Simplicity : Simple controls fit for everyone. No Violence : Take it at your own pace and rules.
